text: Restore||Raze the foul things' settlement to the ground and restore control to a nearby faction of Order.

Plunder||Steal wealth and damage buildings. Upkeep is lowered for your your army having had thier share of gold from the sacking. All captives are enslaved, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
